* Dinobot dropped the rifle and caught Tavatron in his arms as she fell back 
upon him, so...the Predacon had gotten his original target in the end?! He 
looked down at her but then snapped his head back towards Mosquitor, he 
bared his teeth and snarled...*

" Coming here in the first place was a mistake...but obviously not your 
last!!!"

* With no warning what so ever he targeted Mosquitor's chest-plate and fired 
repeatedly upon it with his sight, after 6 charges were sent towards the 
Predacon enemy he looked back down at Tavatron. THIS was the exact reason 
why he had jumped in front of the acid for her...he never wanted this to 
happen. But it did.
He looked at the wound and the acid dripping from it, he had taken those 
shots because he never wanted her to end up like this.
Dinobot knew that he had to get Tavatron to a CR chamber quickly but there 
was too much threat inside of the base, they would surely be attacked and 
even further damage caused. But then what could he do, he just couldn't let 
her die...not like this.
He could see the pain in her optics and almost hear the silent pleads to end 
the pain, but how?!
Dinobot snarled as he looked up and around for something help her with, it 
was then that his system alerted him of his damage...*

internal comp: " Subject has sustained 45% damage, suggest activating Spark 
Repair Mode."

* Dinobot snarled, he wasn't the one who really needed to repair at the 
moment, it was Tavatron who needed it more the he. Just then an idea seemed 
to form in his mind, HIS repair mode! What if he could somehow adapt it to 
Tavatron and get it to heal her instead? He looked down at his spark cavity, 
a green glow already beginning to develop for his repair.
Dinobot held her close enough to his chest that his system would detect her 
damage instead of his, but there was a dear problem. Even though it was 
passable to repair a second bot with his repair mode it was not used to 
other systems then his own, in simple words...it would be excruciating for 
her as it repaired her systems, perhaps even worse then the acid felt right 
now!
Dinobot growled, but he had to try!*

" Computer, ready repair transfer to second subject."

inter comp: " Repair mode has now been altered to repair second subject, 
damage of second subject has been detected. Repair...activated."

* Dinobot looked Tavatron straight in the optics, he didn't like the fact 
that it was him now that hurt her but it was for a good cause.
Soon the green coil which was his repair mode coiled about Tavatron's chest 
from his spark cavity and began to adapt to her systems, now the pain would 
begin!
He didn't know it then but as his system began to slowly but steadily try 
and repair Tavatron's damage it also created a faint link from his systems 
to her's, if she concentrated enough then she would eventually begin to know 
what his lift was like, what he felt, even what he had been before he had 
died. His memories and knowledge were now accessible to her but not able to 
be copied, only faintly glimpsed like a foggy dream.
It was almost like sharing a mind...his mind!*

( If Fire Fox has any problems with this post please feel free to mail me. 
And she can decide weather to begin to repair or not, remember, he's only 
trying...not moding or forcing her to repair. Thank you for your time.)
